plot: An urban legend describes monsters known as "bagurimono" lurk in dark corners of Akihabara, the paradise of anime. When Tamotsu Denkigai encounters one, he is almost killed but saved at the last moment by a girl named Matome Mayonaka, who repells the attack and later revives him.
opening_theme: "Ikken Rakuchaku Go Yōjin" (一件落着ゴ用心) by Earphones
ending_theme: "Riraimirai" (リライミライ) by Mimi Meme MIMI (ep 2)
"Sankei Tōsen!" (サンキトウセン!) by Earphones (eps 3-4)
"Chō Hannō Girl" (超反応ガール) by AŌP (ep 5)
"Kokoro no Memory" (心のメモリー) by every♥ing! (ep 6)
"Koi ni Shinzan!" (恋に新参!) by Shoko Nakagawa ft. Ladybeard (ep 7)
"Sekai Jū no AKihabara de" (セカイじゅうのAKIHABARAで) by Halko Momoi (ep 9)
"Kūfuku kara Yarinaose!" (空腹からやりなおせ!) by petit milady (ep 10)
